text: (Appotu avarkal)"niccayamaka nir tam yusuhpo? Enru kettarkal; (am!) Nan tam yusuhpu (ito!) Ivar ennutaiya cakotararavar; niccayamaka allah enkal mitu arul purintirukkinran; evar (avanitam payapaktiyutan irukkirarkalo, innum porumaiyum merkontirukkiraro (attataiya) nanmai ceyvor kuliyai niccayamaka allah vinakkivitamattan" enru kurinar
